pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video is a still image with a slow zoom effect applied. The shot is a dramatic, wide-angle landscape view of the Grand Canyon under a turbulent sky. Large, white, and dark storm clouds dominate the frame, with shafts of rain visible in the distance, creating a moody and majestic atmosphere over the vast, layered rock formations.
